sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.youtube-configurator
  .input-container
    v-text-field(:label="label"
      :placeholder="placeholder"
      @keyup.enter="onSubmit"
      clearable
      hide-details="auto").input-style
    v-btn.add-style(click="console.log('hurrah!')") +
  v-switch(v-model="pauseSwitch"
    label="Pause on load"
    color="red"
    :class="{activated: pauseSwitch}").switch-style
  .butonic-plague
    v-btn(@click="onSyncPlaylist").btn-style Sync Playlist
    v-btn(@click="onPlayNext" :disabled="isCurrentPlaylistEmpty").btn-style Play Next

</template>

<script>
import { mapState } from 'pinia'
import { VTextField, VSwitch, VBtn } from 'vuetify/components'
import { usePlaylistStore } from '../store/playlist'
import { useSettingStore } from '../store/settings'
export default {
  components: {
    VTextField,
    VSwitch,
    VBtn
  },
  data() {
    return {
      pauseSwitch: true,
      key: 0,
      label: 'Enter a URL or video ID',
      placeholder: 'ex: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_83LZ79VMLg&ab_channel=MrMoMMusic'
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(useSettingStore, ['autopause']),
    ...mapState(usePlaylistStore, ['currentPlaylist']),
    isCurrentPlaylistEmpty() {
      return this.currentPlaylist.length === 0
    }
  },
  emits: ['onSubmit', 'toggle-switch', 'mouseleave'],
  methods: {
    onSubmit(event) {
      const userInput = event.srcElement._value
      if (userInput && userInput.replace(/\s/g, '').length) {
        this.$emit('onSubmit', userInput)
      }
    },
    onPlayNext() {
      const playStore = usePlaylistStore()
      if (++this.key === playStore.currentPlaylist.length) this.key = 0
      playStore.changeSong(this.key)
    },
    onSyncPlaylist() {
      const playStore = usePlaylistStore()
      playStore.syncPlaylist()
    }
  },
  watch: {
    pauseSwitch() {
      const playStore = useSettingStore()
      playStore.toggleAutopause()
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style></style>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import 'src/styles/flex';

$input-height : 50px;
.youtube-configurator {
  @include flex-column();
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 25px;


  .input-container {
    @include flex-row();
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: 10px;

    .input-style {
      color: red;
      width: 350px;
      // height: $input-height;
    }
    .add-style {
      // height: $input-height;
    }
  }

  .btn-style {
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }

  .activated {
    color: red;
  }

}
</style>
